paper_title: Uniqueness of critical metrics for a quadratic curvature functional
abstract: In this paper we prove new rigidity results for complete, possibly non-compact, critical metrics of the quadratic curvature functionals $\mathfrak{S}^2 = \int R_g^{2} dV_g$. We show that critical metrics $(M^n, g)$ with finite energy are always scalar flat, i.e. a global minimum, provided $n\geq 10$ or $7\leq n \leq 9$ and $M^n$ has at least two ends.
